The rational behind having this was to:

Try and reduce multiple contacts with fans in the same household, e.g. when ringing up fans to renew membership, community shares etc. A quick look on the system will allow the admin user to see if another member exists at the same household so not to make multiple phone calls.
Identify parent/child relationships if child is a junior member
As it stands, this section is open for misunderstanding from the admin users point of view so we could end up with all sorts of information in there, and therefore ending up not being useful at all.
